footer.companyDescription: Tariq Al Nur Al Arabi is a leading company in aluminum and glass manufacturing, with years of experience delivering high-quality solutions for residential and commercial needs.

about.title: About Tariq Al Nur Al Arabi
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Fabrication & Total Construction Solutions

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Tariq Al Nur Al Arabi (TNAC) started as a statement against the sloppy professional standards that dominated the field of construction services 20 years ago. We wanted to set a new, high standard and work as consultants, solving our clients' problems.
ourStory.paragraph2: The company quickly grew and cemented itself as the new golden standard in commercial construction. Today we continue to build on that legacy and strive for excellence at everything we do.
ourStory.paragraph3: At TNAC, we aspire to contribute to the growth and development of Saudi Arabia while aligning with Vision 2030. Our commitment to delivering excellence, professionalism, and long-term value in every project we undertake.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We aim to be one of the most trusted and recognized names in the fabrication and construction industry. With successful project execution across residential, commercial, and industrial sectors, our company is driven by technical excellence, vast experience, and strong partnerships.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Tariq Al Nur Al Arabi (TNAC) is committed to delivering excellence, professionalism, and long-term value in every project we undertake. Our goal is to build lasting relationships with clients across the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by upholding mutual respect, integrity, and a strong work ethic.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Let's work together to bring your vision to life with our expert craftsmanship and professional service.

services.title: Our Comprehensive Services
services.subtitle: Complete construction and fabrication solutions for all your needs

stainlessSteel.title: Stainless Steel Fabrication
stainlessSteel.description: Professional kitchen fabrication for home, commercial, and industrial applications with premium quality materials.

aluminumGlass.title: Aluminum & Glass Works
aluminumGlass.description: Complete aluminum solutions including structures, cladding, windows, doors, and office installations.

ironFabrication.title: Iron & Steel Fabrication
ironFabrication.description: Heavy-duty iron shade hangers and custom steel fabrication for industrial and commercial needs.

woodCarpentry.title: Wood Materials & Carpentry
woodCarpentry.description: Professional carpentry services for custom furniture and interior woodwork solutions.

hvac.title: HVAC Systems
hvac.description: Complete HVAC solutions including exhaust systems, AC ductwork, and ventilation installations.

electrical.title: Electrical & Low Voltage
electrical.description: Professional electrical installations and low voltage systems for residential and commercial projects.

gypsumCeiling.title: Gypsum & Ceiling Work
gypsumCeiling.description: Professional gypsum work including partitions, ceiling design, and finishing solutions.

tilesFlooring.title: Tiles & Flooring Work
tilesFlooring.description: Complete flooring solutions including all types of tiles, stone, and specialized flooring.

waterproofing.title: Waterproofing & Heat Insulation
waterproofing.description: Professional waterproofing and thermal insulation services for all types of buildings.

materialsSupply.title: Building Materials & Power Tools Supply
materialsSupply.description: Complete supply solutions for contractors and developers with quality materials and tools.

process.title: Our Work Process
process.subtitle: From consultation to completion, we ensure excellence at every step

step1.title: Consultation & Planning
step1.description: We meet with clients to understand their needs and develop comprehensive project plans.

step2.title: Design & Engineering
step2.description: Our team creates detailed designs and engineering solutions tailored to your requirements.

step3.title: Fabrication & Installation
step3.description: Expert fabrication in our workshop followed by professional installation at your site.

step4.title: Quality Control & Delivery
step4.description: Rigorous quality checks ensure perfect results and timely project completion.

cta.title: Need Professional Construction Services?
cta.description: Contact us today for a free consultation and quote for your next project.

culture.title: Our Company Culture
culture.paragraph1: At Tariq Al Nur Al Arabi, our people are what make us unique. Rather than outsourcing our construction engineers, we provide them with an environment that supports professional growth and excellence.
culture.paragraph2: We are strong believers in giving our employees a voice. Our teams are put together with careful consideration to ensure maximum productivity, engagement, and job satisfaction.

contact.subtitle: Ready to start your next project? Contact us today for professional consultation and competitive quotes

companyInfo.title: About Our Company
companyInfo.description: TNAC has built a strong reputation by providing a wide range of services in the construction and fabrication sectors. With our experienced team and modern equipment, we execute each project with precision and professionalism.

location.title: Visit Our Location
location.description: Come visit our headquarters in Jeddah to see our facilities and discuss your project in person.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, ensuring the highest quality standards and superior craftsmanship.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Honesty and transparency guide all our business relationships, building trust with clients and partners.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously adopt new technologies and methods to deliver cutting-edge solutions to our clients.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Quality is at the heart of everything we do, from material selection to final project delivery.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Tariq Al Nur Al Arabi?
whyChooseUs.description: With decades of experience, we combine innovation, craftsmanship, and dedication to deliver exceptional solutions. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction makes us a trusted partner for clients across the region. We don't just manufacture products, we build long-lasting relationships.

aboutCompany.description: Tariq Al Nur Al Arabi is a leading Saudi company with over 25 years of experience in manufacturing high-quality aluminum. Our experienced team ensures excellence through a practical approach, providing superior quality and service. Tariq Al Nur Al Arabi enjoys the trust of its clients, suppliers, and employees alike, making it the ideal choice for aluminum products in the region.

clients.title: Our Trusted Clients & Partners
clients.subtitle: Building lasting partnerships with leading companies across Saudi Arabia and the region
clients.sectionSubtitle: We're proud to work with some of the most respected companies in various industries
clients.imageAlt: Professional team working on construction project

descriptions.albaik: Providing comprehensive kitchen equipment and HVAC solutions for one of Saudi Arabia's most beloved fast-food chains.
descriptions.kfc: Delivering high-quality kitchen systems and equipment for multiple KFC outlets across the Kingdom.
descriptions.famousBurger: Custom stainless steel kitchen equipment and fabrication solutions for this growing burger chain.
descriptions.twoBites: Complete kitchen HVAC and equipment solutions for modern quick-service restaurant operations.
descriptions.hungry: Specialized stainless steel fabrication and kitchen equipment for contemporary dining experiences.
descriptions.cabibo: Comprehensive kitchen HVAC systems and equipment installation for premium food service operations.
descriptions.centuryBurger: Custom stainless steel solutions and kitchen equipment for authentic burger restaurant experiences.
descriptions.cafeAroma: Complete kitchen systems and HVAC solutions for specialty coffee and dining establishments.
descriptions.panda: Large-scale kitchen equipment and fabrication solutions for one of Saudi Arabia's leading hypermarket chains.
descriptions.modon: Industrial HVAC and construction solutions for Saudi Arabia's premier industrial development authority.
descriptions.alkifaContracting: Structural aluminum works and fabrication solutions for major construction and infrastructure projects.
descriptions.saudiEmaar: Premium aluminum and glass systems for luxury real estate and commercial development projects.
descriptions.emaar: High-end metal fabrication and construction solutions for prestigious real estate developments.
descriptions.khayal: Advanced construction and fabrication solutions for innovative entertainment and cultural projects.
descriptions.etmam: Hospital infrastructure and specialized equipment solutions for government healthcare facilities.
descriptions.labeeb: Data center infrastructure and technology facility solutions for digital transformation projects.

quality.title: Uncompromising Quality
quality.description: We maintain the highest standards in every project, using premium materials and proven techniques to deliver exceptional results that exceed expectations.

experience.title: 15+ Years of Excellence
experience.description: Our extensive experience across diverse industries has equipped us with the knowledge and expertise to handle projects of any scale and complexity.

partnership.title: True Partnership Approach
partnership.description: We work closely with our clients as trusted partners, providing ongoing support and maintenance to ensure long-term success and satisfaction.
